text: 26.28: Kis 24.8 naŋga, Jer 31.31-34 naŋga, Sek 9.11 naŋga, Ro 5.15 naŋga, 1 Ko 10.16 naŋga, Hi 9.22Nɨŋandɨhin yandɨ ñaŋgwɨ. Got naŋga krunavundi nuŋandɨŋ sɨhanaŋga vata mɨŋavɨsɨhuramata sirɨtɨmbin. Yi ñaŋgwɨ kanɨŋandɨhin, krunavundi sɨhanaŋga ñamba vana andɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ kuŋgɨ kuyɨvɨrɨm taŋgusiŋgɨn.
